cases.searchText: fee-paid judge of the first-tier tribunal, immigration and asylum chamber — pre-application seminar 2025 uk courts court ruled that ai-generated legal summaries require human review before reliance. automated tools can assist but cannot replace lawyer judgment. sanctions possible for unchecked ai submissions. this means lawyers must verify ai output before filing, treating it like junior associate work requiring supervision. professional responsibility legal tech litigation
